text:
@piersmorgan The biggest problem in the UK at the moment is not the Covid19 virus, it’s people like you and the mainstream spreading sensationalist lies in the name of “news”. 
I know I’ve stopped watching and reading your bullsh*t, I’m sure millions more have too.
